name: Ball Slider 3D
description:
Drag, push and rotate the buttons to keep the ball moving! Can you make it to the finish?

How To Play:

- Tap the red button to control red objects
- Slide the blue handle to rotate blue objects
- Turn the yellow dial to rotate yellow objects
- Avoid bumpers and falling off the track
- Collect gems and unlock new balls

Stay Connected
